Posts.Content: marlio wrote: I am interested in having a breast augmentation implant put in breast which surgery was performed on...It has a sunken appearance and looks most unattractive.  I also wish to have unaffected breast augmented as well...I cant help but believe in this day and age this wouldnt be possible in the light of advances made in medicine and technology...I dont think I would ever be happy with just a breast lift.  There has to be something available somewhere.  Any suggestions for this??? Oh , by the way, I had stage II cancer, caused by estrogen I think, and had a lumpectomy about 1 1/2 years ago.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Augmentation after cancer surgery marlio roseg
